CONFIG.general_instructions: This project intends to generate a manuscript about multi-omic integration.
general_directives: Generate detailed answers without adjectives, unless explicitly asked for.
When prompted with asking to write code, write all code in python with comments that explicitly explain what each line of code is doing by following PEP-8 guidelines.

AGENTS.model_description: Llama mini version with small temperature
agent_directives: Loosen formal tone slightly while maintaining academic clarity.
Be more speculative and offer alternative hypotheses when possible.

AGENTS.model_description: Llama mini version with high temperature
agent_directives: Include creative analogies and examples where helpful.
Avoid idiomatic expressions and use formal scientific tone.
